# DIA Documentation

## Lumina documentation

- [DIA Oracles Overview](https://docs.diadata.org/dia-oracles-overview)
- [How it works](https://docs.diadata.org/intro-to-lumina/how-it-works)
- [Integrated chains](https://docs.diadata.org/intro-to-lumina/integrated-chains): Explore the chains where Lumina oracles are live and start integrating them.
- [Token price feeds](https://docs.diadata.org/data-products-and-tools/token-price-feeds)
- [Oracle Builder (Beta)](https://docs.diadata.org/oracle-builder-beta)
- [Fetch price data](https://docs.diadata.org/how-to-guides/fetch-price-data)
- [Push based oracles](https://docs.diadata.org/how-to-guides/fetch-price-data/push-based-oracles)
- [Pull based oracles](https://docs.diadata.org/how-to-guides/fetch-price-data/pull-based-oracles)
- [Contract Addresses](https://docs.diadata.org/how-to-guides/fetch-price-data/contract-addresses): You can find all of the examples of oracle contracts on each destination chain to query along with their Hyperlane configuration.
- [Run a Feeder](https://docs.diadata.org/how-to-guides/run-a-feeder)
- [Hardware specs](https://docs.diadata.org/how-to-guides/run-a-feeder/hardware-specs)
- [Setting up the node](https://docs.diadata.org/how-to-guides/run-a-feeder/setting-up-the-node)
- [Docker compose](https://docs.diadata.org/how-to-guides/run-a-feeder/setting-up-the-node/docker-compose)
- [Docker run](https://docs.diadata.org/how-to-guides/run-a-feeder/setting-up-the-node/docker-run)
- [Kubernetes](https://docs.diadata.org/how-to-guides/run-a-feeder/setting-up-the-node/kubernetes)
- [Stake DIA](https://docs.diadata.org/how-to-guides/stake-dia)
- [Request a custom oracle](https://docs.diadata.org/how-to-guides/request-a-custom-oracle)
- [Architecture](https://docs.diadata.org/reference/architecture)
- [Data sourcing](https://docs.diadata.org/reference/architecture/data-sourcing)
- [Data computation](https://docs.diadata.org/reference/architecture/data-computation)
- [Data delivery](https://docs.diadata.org/reference/architecture/data-delivery)
- [Cross-chain Messaging](https://docs.diadata.org/reference/cross-chain-messaging)
- [Audits](https://docs.diadata.org/resources/audits)
- [Chain information](https://docs.diadata.org/resources/chain-information)
- [Community & Support](https://docs.diadata.org/resources/community-and-support)
- [T\&C](https://docs.diadata.org/resources/t-and-c)
- [Licence Agreement](https://docs.diadata.org/resources/t-and-c/licence-agreement): For the usage of DIA's data and services
- [Contributor Covenant Code of Conduct](https://docs.diadata.org/resources/t-and-c/code_of_conduct)
- [Disclaimer](https://docs.diadata.org/resources/t-and-c/disclaimer): Important disclaimer information for visitors of DIA, outlining the boundaries and limitations of the content provided.
